result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kevin N Ramsey

defendant.name: Ramsey, Kevin N
defendant.address: 225 E Olson Ave; Apt 4, Barron, WI 54812

records.addlTxt:
10:22 AM Defendant Kevin N Ramsey appeared by video, in custody at Rusk County Jail.  Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin. DAR Reporter appears by Zoom Video/Audio. 
Court relates counsel is yet to be appointed and JA is to reach out for counsel and set next hearing.  Bail continues.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report

Adjourned initial appearance on October 26, 2022 at 10:30 am.
NOH sent to Def at Rusk Co Jail

9:59 AM Defendant Kevin N Ramsey appeared by video, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin.   Court relates DE is eligible for Public Defender, but counsel has not yet been appointed.  AIA set for 10/26/2022 at 10:00 AM.  Notice of hearing to be sent to Rusk County Jail with Judge Bitney's Zoom Information. Bond continues.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473. 

THIS BOND IS AMENDED FROM A $5000 SIGNATURE BOND TO A $500 CASH BOND.  ALL CONDITIONS OF PREVIOUS BOND TO REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT.

08/15/2022 AMENDED: COURT ORDERS THE CASH BOND BE AMENDED BACK TO A $5000.00 SIGNATURE BOND. ALL CONDITIONS REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT.

1:32 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kevin N Ramsey appeared by video, in custody from the Rusk County Jail.  Attorney Alex Kitto in court for Kevin N Ramsey. Request for bond modification. Break out room. 1:35 Parties return, case resumes. 
Request to amend bond from a cash bond to a signature bond. State does not object to reinstatement of $5000.00 signature bond. Court grants bond modification from a $500.00 bond to a $5000.00 signature bond. Prior conditions remain in full force and effect. 

Bond to be sent to the defendant in the Rusk Co. Jail.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473. 

THIS BOND IS AMENDED FROM A $5000 SIGNATURE BOND TO A $500 CASH BOND.  ALL CONDITIONS OF PREVIOUS BOND TO REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT.

1:13 PM Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kevin N Ramsey appeared by video, in custody from Rusk County.  Attorney Alex Kitto appeared by video for Kevin N Ramsey. 

1:15  Court relates and gives appearances.  Court quashes warrant.
1:15  Atty. Kitto and defendant go into break-out room; 1:17 return from break-out room.
1:17  Atty. Kitto relates.
1:20  State relates and requests cash bond be set.
1:20  Court questions defendant.
Amended bond set.
AIA set.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.

(Amended bond and MS scanned to jail)

12:58 PM Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kevin N Ramsey appeared by video, in custody from Rusk County Jail.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Kevin N Ramsey (for today only)

1:01  Court relates and gives appearances.
1:02  Defendant is eligible for Public Defender services.
1:03  Atty. Rockow and defendant go into break-out room; 1:07 Return from break-out room.
1:07  Atty. Rockow relates regarding defendant's non-appearance for court hearing.  
1:08  State relates.
1:08  Court relates and does not quash warrant.  
Public Defender is working on assigning counsel for defendant.

(MS scanned to jail)

11:06 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kevin N Ramsey not in court. 

PCW   Statewide and adjacent States.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.

1:14 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kevin N Ramsey appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Lauri Osberg appears on behalf of DE. DE qualifies for PD.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.
